definition.name: NXfit_background

symbols.doc: The symbols used in the schema to specify e.g. dimensions of arrays.

symbol.name: dimRank
symbol.doc: Rank of the dependent and independent data arrays (for multidimensional/multivariate fit.)

definition.doc: Description of the background for an NXfit model.

field.name: label
field.doc: Human-readable label which specifies which concept/entity the background represents/identifies.

field.name: position
field.doc: Position values along one or more data dimensions (to hold the values for the independent variable).

field.name: intensity
field.doc: This array holds the intensity/count values of the fitted background at each position.

group.name: function
group.doc: The functional form of the background.

attribute.name: default
attribute.doc:
.. index:: plotting
Declares which child group contains a path leading to a :ref:`NXdata` group.
It is recommended (as of NIAC2014) to use this attribute to help define the path to the default dataset to be plotted. See https://www.nexusformat.org/2014_How_to_find_default_data.html for a summary of the discussion.
